metadata.title: CVE-2023-6915 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Null pointer dereference problem was found in ida_free in lib/idr.c inthe Linux Kernel. This issue may allow an attacker using this library tocause a denial of service problem due to a missing check at a functionreturn.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
